html:
7.4.18  3:15 am   I just wrote a song for the piano and I can't tell what its time signature is?? I don't think it's in 4/4 but in some places it seems like it could be. Is there a way I could figure it out myself?

     just write it out and see where you wanna put the bar lines. then count the beats in each bar and label each bar accordingly. if any bar is the same size as the previous then you don't need to label that bar

7.4.18  2:22 am   i think you're The Joker. are you?

     i have that skill set

7.4.18  2:12 am   I have to many intersts now and I don't have the time to do them. What should I do?

     how much time do you have .... let's open up a negotiation here

7.4.18  12:27 am   hi bill, i'm a human that gets very anxious in front of an audience. do you have any tips on how i can not be so scared of other humans looking at me?

     the only way to get used to this is to spend more time doing it. it's like building fences. you don't learn how to build fences by not building fences

7.4.18  12:04 am   hey bill why do i sometimes feel weird and think about things that the brain cannot comprehend at times

     you are pushing the envelope. that is helpful because the there's a lot of envelopes out there, and they need to be pushed. someone's gotta do it

7.4.18  12:03 am   what do you think of accordions

     experts only

7.4.18  12:02 am   hey bill what's your favorite thing

     combining different things together

7.3.18  11:58 pm   Will I win the lotto tonight?

      probably not

7.3.18  11:29 pm   do you like to have fun with shadows?

     yes, and light

7.3.18  11:05 pm   ok, i'm white (in this chess challenge).

1.d4

     i'm not sure the color selection process was entirely fair

7.3.18  10:48 pm   How long does it take you to come up with answers to these questions?

      hopefully 1 second, unless the question for some reason stirs a deep emotional conflict within my soul

7.3.18  10:26 pm   why is "in california" not on youtube

     because it doesn't have a video

7.3.18  10:16 pm   do you know the lyrics to your own songs by heart?

     no

7.3.18  10:08 pm   how can i truly become "musical"

      some people do it through marriage

7.3.18  8:14 pm   What kind of shows do you watch?

     it's more fun to make the show

7.3.18  8:09 pm   What's your opinion on tyrannosaurus rexes?

      they have a lot of star power

7.3.18  8:06 pm   you ever have a pet animal before?

     no

      who was it?

7.3.18  7:15 pm   do you like yourself?

     i have a business relationship with myself

7.3.18  6:28 pm   what is america

      it's kind of like a hot air balloon

7.3.18  5:39 pm   how do i ask an actual question

     so far you are doing great

7.3.18  5:28 pm   What's a fun game to play on an airplane?

     pilot

7.3.18  5:14 pm   What's an artist ? 

     people like you

7.3.18  5:11 pm   If you could name an asteroid what would you call it?

     that depends on the asteroid's personality

7.3.18  4:55 pm   Okay so I made some art. What do I do with it now?

     put it in the fridge. make sure it is clearly labeled!

7.3.18  4:42 pm   Twitter know has pop up ads telling me to get a twitter account which only makes me not want a twitter account even more. Why are they so desperate for me to join them? They want to spy on me or steal my soul or something?

     perhaps they are in financial trouble? that's just a guess, i'm really not sure .....

7.3.18  4:33 pm   Sometimes I'm surprised that my behavior surprises people but then I remember that I'm sometimes surprised by people. 

     that's true

7.3.18  4:24 pm   Bill, it's been 4 years since you released your last EP. are you ever gonna release a new album?

     i'm not sure what EP means but i prefer to release songs individually. let the songs roam free, that's what i say

7.3.18  3:57 pm   if your name wasn't bill, what do you think it might be?

     bob dole?

7.3.18  3:23 pm   opinion on spiders?

     i think they are doing a great job

7.3.18  3:08 pm   do you play sports?

     i am sports

7.3.18  2:33 pm   In 'hello sexy pants' you bring up congress twice, both in negative examples.  Is this your way of saying that the current political climate in Washington is in a downward spiral toward chaos?

     no

7.3.18  1:43 pm   what should i do if the moon is about to fall direcly into my house?

     sell your house for maybe 300 dollars

7.3.18  12:52 pm   I agree that a digital rhodes sound works better for your purpose. And of course they're heavy, but don't you think that's where the mojo is?

     there is mojo every where. this whole world, and entire universe is mojo. it's mojo universe

7.3.18  11:13 am   are you getting a little bit too much of a kick putting muffins in the cookie jar?

     i'm actually getting bored with it. looking for something different to put in there

7.3.18  11:01 am   Is your unboxing vid meant to be satirical 

     no

7.3.18  10:55 am   i tried playing a drum pattern i couldn't get down at like 40 bpm and for the first time i really *felt* the space in between every beat like i never felt before. why does the power of music have to slowly reveal itself in these sly, unusual ways

     that doesn't seem unusual to me at all. slow the tempo down, hear more space. like if you build the same house bigger there's more space in the rooms, just be careful it doesn't fall over

7.3.18  10:52 am   Do you still have the clownfish that was in your old room

     yes

7.3.18  8:04 am   Can we get a hint about your next video?

     sure

7.3.18  7:58 am   do you care?

     yes

7.3.18  7:21 am   do you ever think about your feelings?

     yes

     or is your work more important than whatever state of mind you're in?

     i actually use my feelings, and mind, to create most of my work

      like, do you ever say "i'm too sad to do this right now", and then postpone it until the right mood comes around

7.3.18  6:42 am   Have you hired an assistant to inform you about new memes yet?

     not necessary. people already send them to this questions page and all my social media accounts, for free

7.3.18  6:27 am   do you ever get hate messages?

     yes, and love

      i'm asking this because it's hard for me to imagine how on earth would your content make anyone angry

     perhaps if they like anger but they are not finding it here, they could send me messages of anger wondering where the anger is, while also providing me with some

7.3.18  6:16 am   How do I kill a person because I've never done it before?

     that is not my area of expertise

7.3.18  5:25 am   Can i buy a salad or is it bad?

     maybe both

7.3.18  5:06 am   first i thought that your answers didn't have any meaning and you just avoided answering questions seriously to be mysterious, but now i feel like the answers tell something about you even if it seems like they're random. pls say that they aren't just 100% random and i didn't make fool of myself here

     they are zero percent random. my priority is to have a fun good and nice time, here on the questions page, if possible. it's been going on for many years and i am always learning new things and developing new strategies. strange things start to happen after the questions get into the 100,000s

7.3.18  5:01 am   do you love yourself

     i have a business relationship with myself

7.3.18  4:40 am   Do you write 1 song a day, even if it's not very good, or do you write a really great song over the course of a longer period of time? (quantity or quality)

      how about both

7.3.18  3:41 am   how is exsistence

     it's interesting to say the least

7.3.18  3:31 am   are you cool like those big rocks you find on the road?

     ah you have found me out

7.3.18  3:27 am   Did you ever get the stamp off your floor?

     yes but i had to call a stamp expert to do it
